scripts.mobile:dev:ios: cd apps/mobile/OmniListerMobile && eas build --platform ios --profile development
scripts.mobile:dev:android: cd apps/mobile/OmniListerMobile && eas build --platform android --profile development
scripts.mobile:dev: cd apps/mobile/OmniListerMobile && eas build --platform all --profile development
scripts.mobile:beta:ios: cd apps/mobile/OmniListerMobile && eas build --platform ios --profile preview
scripts.mobile:beta:android: cd apps/mobile/OmniListerMobile && eas build --platform android --profile preview
scripts.mobile:beta: cd apps/mobile/OmniListerMobile && eas build --platform all --profile preview
scripts.mobile:prod:ios: cd apps/mobile/OmniListerMobile && eas build --platform ios --profile production
scripts.mobile:prod:android: cd apps/mobile/OmniListerMobile && eas build --platform android --profile production
scripts.mobile:prod: cd apps/mobile/OmniListerMobile && eas build --platform all --profile production
scripts.mobile:submit:ios:prod: cd apps/mobile/OmniListerMobile && eas submit --platform ios --latest --profile production
scripts.mobile:submit:android:prod: cd apps/mobile/OmniListerMobile && eas submit --platform android --latest --profile production
